newsitem.title: USA: Evans Systems sets 5 pct stock dividend.
newsitem.headline: Evans Systems sets 5 pct stock dividend.

text.p: Evans Systems Inc said Wednesday its board had declared a five percent stock dividend, payable January 20, record December 31.
The company said its board made the decision after reviewing the significant improvement in Evans's financial performance in the fiscal year ended September 30.

"We remain committed to increasing shareholder value and improving the investment community's awareness of Evans Systems Inc. The issuance of this stock dividend was not only to reward our shareholders for their commitment, but also demonstrates the board's confidence in the future growth of Evans Systems," said J.L. Evans, president and chief executive officer, in a statement.

Evans's four key business segments include petroleum marketing, convenience stores in South Texas and Louisiana, ChemWay Systems, and EDCO Environmental Systems, which provides environmental remediation services.
